name: Sovereignty Tarot Sketch Base - Masc
description:
SL VERSION: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Abnormality/179/133/1763

MY BASES ARE FOR USE ON A LAPTOP OR DESKTOP COMPUTER WITH AT LEAST 4GIGS OF RAM!! I CANNOT GUARENTEE THEY WILL FUNCTION ON ANY TABLET!

This is a 800x1024 PSD of the sketch base made for the  for the Sovereignty Tarot Card released at The Guild, 2022. The lines are much rougher than my past releases, but in-turn look a little more natural and loose.

This is ONLY the PSD. 

This base can be used for much more than its original purpose! Comes with 90+ layers.  Backgrounds, some clothing and accessories!  Featuring Tarot overlays and cardback design by Era Mercury!

Contains parts for :

  • General Stylized kemono/furry
  • Canine (general fox, wolf, domestic)
  • Feline (big cat and domestic)
  • Hyena
  • Rat
  • Cow
  • Bat
  • Bunny
  • Goat

THIS BASE IS NOT SCHEDULED TO GET UPDATES

Making add-on packs, doing commissions with and adding to adoptables/reference sheets with this base is a-okay so long as you do not share this base unedited!
